name: Nicole Seibert
description:
'''Nicole Seibert''' (n√©e '''Hohloch'''; born 25 October 1964), known professionally as '''Nicole''', is a German singer, songwriter, musician and producer.
In 1982, she became the first German representative to win the [[Eurovision Song Contest]]. She has released more than 25 [[studio albums]] and 80 [[Single (music)|singles]], some of which she performed and recorded in, among other languages, [[English language|English]], [[Dutch language|Dutch]], and [[French language|French]]. She wrote the music and lyrics for some of her recordings.
